org.springframework.boot.context.properties.source

接口 ConfigurationPropertySource

  • 所有已知子接口:
    IterableConfigurationPropertySource
    所有已知实现类:
    MapConfigurationPropertySource

    public interface ConfigurationPropertySource
    A source of ConfigurationProperties.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0.0
    另请参阅:
    ConfigurationPropertyName, OriginTrackedValue, getConfigurationProperty(ConfigurationPropertyName)

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default ConfigurationPropertyState containsDescendantOf(ConfigurationPropertyName name)
      Returns if the source contains any descendants of the specified name.
      default ConfigurationPropertySource filter(Predicate<ConfigurationPropertyName> filter)
      Return a filtered variant of this source, containing only names that match the given Predicate.
      ConfigurationProperty getConfigurationProperty(ConfigurationPropertyName name)
      Return a single ConfigurationProperty from the source or null if no property can be found.
      Object getUnderlyingSource()
      Return the underlying PropertySource.
      default ConfigurationPropertySource withAliases(ConfigurationPropertyNameAliases aliases)
      Return a variant of this source that supports name aliases.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getConfigurationProperty

        ConfigurationProperty getConfigurationProperty(ConfigurationPropertyName name)
        Return a single ConfigurationProperty from the source or null if no property can be found.
        参数:
        name - the name of the property (must not be null)
        返回:
        the associated object or null.

      • containsDescendantOf

        default ConfigurationPropertyState containsDescendantOf(ConfigurationPropertyName name)
        Returns if the source contains any descendants of the specified name. May return ConfigurationPropertyState.PRESENT or ConfigurationPropertyState.ABSENT if an answer can be determined or ConfigurationPropertyState.UNKNOWN if it's not possible to determine a definitive answer.
        参数:
        name - the name to check
        返回:
        if the source contains any descendants

      • filter

        default ConfigurationPropertySource filter(Predicate<ConfigurationPropertyName> filter)
        Return a filtered variant of this source, containing only names that match the given Predicate.
        参数:
        filter - the filter to match
        返回:
        a filtered ConfigurationPropertySource instance

      • withAliases

        default ConfigurationPropertySource withAliases(ConfigurationPropertyNameAliases aliases)
        Return a variant of this source that supports name aliases.
        参数:
        aliases - a function that returns a stream of aliases for any given name
        返回:
        a ConfigurationPropertySource instance supporting name aliases

      • getUnderlyingSource

        Object getUnderlyingSource()
        Return the underlying PropertySource.
        返回:
        the underlying property source.
